Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Oakland in 1970...
Injured on 9/1/1970 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 5/25/1972 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Injured on 7/12/1973 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Released by Oakland on 2/20/1975...
Drafted in 6th round, 116th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1978...
Injured on 8/1/1982 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Released by St. Louis on 3/2/1985...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1987...
Traded from Minnesota to New York (N) on 3/2/1989 (Going to NYM: RF R. Sanders, P W. Alvarez. Going to MIN: CF K. Yamamoto)...
Injured on 6/2/1990 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1992, off Bryn Smith (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/28/1992, off Rheal Cormier (HOU)...
Injured on 7/9/1992 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 5/16/1995...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/4/1995...
